data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
In Bologna a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 3, Sassuolo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Bologna in their own half.
In the minute 4, Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
Daniele Doveri signals a Sassuolo throw-in in Bologna's half.
Sassuolo's Filip Djuricic gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 7, Bologna have a goal kick.
Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Sassuolo goal kick.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
Goal! Roberto Soriano gives Bologna a 1-0 lead.
Great play from Rodrigo Palacio to set up the goal.
In the minute 11, Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
Daniele Doveri awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 12, Sassuolo's Domenico Berardi gets in a shot on goal at Renato Dall'Ara. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Francesco Caputo of Sassuolo gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bologna.
In the minute 13, Throw-in Bologna.
Throw-in for Bologna in the half of Sassuolo.
Bologna are coming forward and Musa Barrow gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 14, Daniele Doveri awards Sassuolo a goal kick.
Can Sassuolo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bologna's half?
Giorgos Kyriakopoulos gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sassuolo.
In the minute 18, Goal! Sassuolo go level at 1-1 through Domenico Berardi in Bologna.
Can Bologna capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Bologna to take a throw-in in Sassuolo territory.
In the minute 26, Ball safe as Sassuolo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
Hamed Junior Traore is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Sassuolo's Hamed Junior Traore is back in action after a slight knock.
Sassuolo to take a throw-in in Bologna territory.
In the minute 29, Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
Bologna's Mattias Svanberg gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sassuolo defender.
The match at Renato Dall'Ara has been interrupted briefly for a check on Mert Muldur, who is down injured.
In the minute 32, Mert Muldur is back on the pitch.
Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
In the minute 35, Takehiro Tomiyasu (Bologna) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Sassuolo.
Mattias Svanberg for Bologna has been booked by Daniele Doveri and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 36, Sassuolo drive upfield and Francesco Caputo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Bologna defender.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Daniele Doveri.
Rodrigo Palacio (Bologna) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 38, Goal kick for Sassuolo at Renato Dall'Ara.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Mattias Svanberg is on target to give Bologna a 2-1 advantage.
In the minute 39, Roberto Soriano instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick Sassuolo.
Free kick for Sassuolo in the half of Bologna.
In the minute 42, Corner awarded to Bologna.
Can Bologna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sassuolo's half?
In Bologna a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, Lorenzo De Silvestri (Bologna) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Sassuolo defenders.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Daniele Doveri.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
Sassuolo's Francesco Caputo misses with an attempt on goal.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Renato Dall'Ara.
Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Sassuolo just outside Bologna's area.
In the minute 48, Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Daniele Doveri.
In Bologna Sassuolo attack through Filip Djuricic. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Bologna goal kick.
In the minute 49, Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
Musa Barrow of Bologna smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Sassuolo needs to be cautious. Bologna have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 51, Daniele Doveri awards the away team a throw-in.
Daniele Doveri signals a throw-in for Bologna, close to Sassuolo's area.
Throw-in high up the field for Bologna in Bologna.
In the minute 51, It's a goal kick for the away team in Bologna.
Domenico Berardi for Sassuolo drives towards goal at Renato Dall'Ara. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Sassuolo in the half of Bologna.
In the minute 54, Daniele Doveri signals a Bologna throw-in in Sassuolo's half.
In Bologna Sassuolo drive forward through Domenico Berardi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
In the minute 55, Bologna are pushing forward but Musa Barrow's finish is wide of the goal.
Daniele Doveri awards Sassuolo a goal kick.
Bologna are pushing forward but Rodrigo Palacio's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 56, Sassuolo have a goal kick.
Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bologna pushes forward through Rodrigo Palacio, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 57, Free kick for Sassuolo in the half of Bologna.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Daniele Doveri.
Important block from the Sassuolo defence as Jerdy Schouten fires in a strike for Bologna.
In the minute 60, It's now 3-1 in Bologna as Riccardo Orsolini scores for Bologna.
Roberto De Zerbi (Sassuolo) is making a first substitution, with Giacomo Raspadori replacing Mehdi Bourabia.
The away team replace Mert Muldur with Kaan Ayhan.
In the minute 61, Maxime Lopez is replacing Hamed Junior Traore for Sassuolo at Renato Dall'Ara.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
Free kick Sassuolo.
In the minute 62, Play has been interrupted briefly in Bologna to check on Lorenzo De Silvestri, who is grimacing with pain.
Filip Djuricic strikes to reduce the deficit to 3-2 at Renato Dall'Ara.
Francesco Caputo with an assist there.
In the minute 64, Sinisa Mihajlovic is making the team's first substitution at Renato Dall'Ara with Nicolas Dominguez replacing Mattias Svanberg.
Can Sassuolo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bologna's half?
In the minute 65, Sassuolo drives forward and Filip Djuricic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ibrahima Mbaye is replacing Lorenzo De Silvestri for the home team.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Sassuolo.
Sassuolo's Filip Djuricic is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 67, Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
In Bologna, Gian Marco Ferrari (Sassuolo) misses the target with a header.
Bologna have a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Bologna to take a throw-in in Sassuolo territory.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Daniele Doveri.
In the minute 70, Goal! Sassuolo draw level to 3-3 through a Francesco Caputo header.
Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Sassuolo push forward at Renato Dall'Ara and Filip Djuricic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Bologna defence.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Daniele Doveri.
In the minute 73, Sassuolo push upfield and Francesco Caputo gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Bologna defence.
Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
In the minute 73, At Renato Dall'Ara, Manuel Locatelli has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Lukasz Skorupski (Bologna) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 75, Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
Giorgos Kyriakopoulos of Sassuolo gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bologna.
Ibrahima Mbaye is booked for the home team.
In the minute 75, Nicola Sansone is on a sub for Musa Barrow for Bologna.
Bologna make their fourth substitution with Federico Santander replacing Rodrigo Palacio.
Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
In the minute 77, Free kick Sassuolo.
Own goal! Takehiro Tomiyasu has scored at the wrong end to make it 3-4.
Sassuolo are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 79, Sassuolo's Giacomo Raspadori misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Bologna goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Bologna!
In the minute 81, Sassuolo make their fourth substitution with Pedro Obiang replacing Filip Djuricic.
Nicola Sansone (Bologna) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 82, Corner awarded to Bologna.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Daniele Doveri.
Sassuolo's Kaan Ayhan has been booked in Bologna.
Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Bologna in the half of Sassuolo.
Goal kick for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Domenico Berardi for Sassuolo who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 88, Domenico Berardi for Sassuolo is back on the field again.
Daniele Doveri signals a Bologna throw-in in Sassuolo's half.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Daniele Doveri.
Sassuolo drives forward and Maxime Lopez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
Can Sassuolo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bologna's half?
Bologna awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Renato Dall'Ara the fourth official shows that 6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Bologna in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Bologna.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
Daniele Doveri awards Bologna a goal kick.
In Bologna a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Bologna, Giacomo Raspadori of Sassuolo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Daniele Doveri.
Bologna have a goal kick.
Sassuoloâ€™s Giacomo Raspadori is on his feet again at Renato Dall'Ara.
Bologna to take a throw-in in Sassuolo territory.
Daniele Doveri signals a Sassuolo throw-in in Bologna's half.
Daniele Doveri blows to end the match. The final score is 3-4.
The away team replace Gian Marco Ferrari with Federico Peluso.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Giacomo Raspadori.
